test.sql: SELECT SUM(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Orders o WHERE o.EmployeeID = e.EmployeeID )) FROM Employees e

expectedError.text: Cannot perform aggregate function on an expression containing a subquery: "SUM"(( SELECT "COUNT"(*) FROM Orders AS o WHERE "o"."EmployeeID" = "e"."EmployeeID")).
Cannot perform aggregate function 'SUM' on an expression containing an aggregate ('COUNT'): "SUM"(( SELECT "COUNT"(*) FROM Orders AS o WHERE "o"."EmployeeID" = "e"."EmployeeID")).
